body_html: We will support fused BN in the future (ideally this should be done via XLA rather than via explicit TF Python code, but we will see). If you need fused BN for the time being, you can simply use the BN layer in contrib.layers (although it is now deprecated).
body_text: We will support fused BN in the future (ideally this should be done via XLA rather than via explicit TF Python code, but we will see). If you need fused BN for the time being, you can simply use the BN layer in contrib.layers (although it is now deprecated).
body: We will support fused BN in the future (ideally this should be done via XLA rather than via explicit TF Python code, but we will see). If you need fused BN for the time being, you can simply use the BN layer in `contrib.layers` (although it is now deprecated).
